summary: AI-based animal disease detection and advice application
architectural_notes: AI/ML integration required for disease detection
Image processing capability for analyzing animal photos
Knowledge base for disease information and advice
Camera integration for direct photo capture
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Camera icon for the photo capture button, simple line art style in earth tones (camera-icon.dim_64x64.png)

existing_features.title: Build a frontend form for users to input animal details and symptoms for disease detection
Create a frontend results display that shows detected diseases with confidence levels, descriptions, and treatment advice
Implement a frontend dashboard showing detection history with animal details and detected diseases

Design a cohesive visual theme using warm, nature-inspired earth tones (greens, browns, soft oranges) with clean sans-serif typography and a compassionate, professional aesthetic suitable for veterinary and agricultural contexts
Add a camera capture button to the AnimalSymptomForm component that opens the device camera and allows users to take a photo of the animal
Store the captured animal photo as part of the detection record in local storage history, encoding it as a base64 data URL
Display the captured animal photo in the DetectionHistoryItem component as a thumbnail preview
Show the full-size captured animal photo on the ResultsPage alongside the disease detection results
Add camera permission handling with clear user feedback if camera access is denied or unavailable

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a backend data model to store animal information including species, breed, age, and symptoms
Implement backend logic to analyze symptoms and detect potential diseases based on predefined disease patterns
Create backend storage for disease information including name, symptoms, affected species, severity, and treatment advice
Integrate camera functionality for capturing animal photos
